contentfulSermon.title: 40 Days in the Word: Week 2 - Why Can I Trust the Bible?

fields.notesFormatted:
2 Timothy 3:16-17

Psalm 119:86

I can trust the Bible because...

  1. It is historically accurate.

    Psalm 33:4

  2. It is scientifically accurate.

  3. It is prophetically accurate.

    2 Peter 1:21

    Matthew 26:56

    Revelation 22:6

  4. It is thematically unified.

    Luke 24:27

    John 5:39

  5. It is confirmed by Jesus.

    Matthew 5:18

  6. It has survived all attacks.

    Matthew 24:35

    1 Peter 1:24-25

  7. It has transforming power.

    John 8:31-32

The big question:

What will be the authority for my life?

The world or the word?

Romans 12:2

Memory verse:

Colossians 3:16 (NIV)

"Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly!"
